creator: rohith@disinfo.net
text:
I would like to propose the ExecTask supports an outputEncoding attribute
that when given an encoding outputs in that specified encoding.
That way on a z/OS platform the output can be ascii (ie: ISO-8859-1)
Development is nearing completion that will address this.
creator: mbenson@apache.org

text: I believe the new <redirector> stuff in CVS should cover this need.
creator: mbenson@apache.org
